description: Allows you to see all the settings for Sierra specific to your server
Changes the color of Sierra's embed messages in your server
This command changes the nickname of Sierra in your server
Used to setup welcome message for your server
Command is used to setup and use leaving messages on your server
Used to setup deleted message logging in your server
Used to setup ban logging for your server
Used to setup the announcement command in your server
Used to setup the clear command for your server
Used to enable kick, ban and unban commands in the server
Used to setup autorole for your server
When used will switch the current channel between an NSFW channel and a normal channel
